metadata.description: GK Delta are the only line of defense against threats that normal humans can't stop! Are these human-animal hybrids the heroes we need...even if the world isn't ready for them? These teenage cryptids were subjects of a top-secret military experiment dedicated to creating the perfect soldier, but the truth is bigger than they've come to realize. Join the team as they're dispatched to Nevada where it's rumored that a monster is menacing locals on the mountain. Have they found a new member of GK Delta? If not, they'll be trapped between it and the townspeople they need to save. Written by Tim Seeley (Grayson, G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero) and illustrated by Mike Norton (Battlepug).
metadata.name: Alter Nation
